sentence.Network_en: A cool breeze made the heat pleasantly bearable.
sentence.Network_cn: 一阵凉风吹来，让炎热的天气变得稍微舒适了一些。

sentence.Network_en: We talked pleasantly of old times.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们愉快地谈着过去的时光。

sentence.Network_en: The rest of the evening passed pleasantly enough.
sentence.Network_cn: 晚上剩余的时间过得十分愉快。

entry.tran: 令人愉快的；舒适的；合意的
entry.def: Something that is pleasant is nice, enjoyable, or attractive.

example.ex: I've got a pleasant little apartment...
example.tran: 我有一套舒适的小公寓。

example.ex: It's always pleasant to do what you're good at doing.
example.tran: 做自己擅长的事总是令人愉快的。

entry.tran: 友好的；可亲的；讨人喜欢的
entry.def: Someone who is pleasant is friendly and likeable.

example.ex: The woman had a pleasant face...
Lloyd George was most anxious to be agreeable and pleasant.
example.tran: 劳埃德·乔治极力想表现得平易近人、和蔼亲切。

sentences.sentence: "`I'll do the dishes,' he said pleasantly"

auth_sentence.content: We were pleasantly surprised when we looked into this.
auth_sentence.res_content: We were pleasantly surprised when we looked into this.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We were pleasantly surprised when we looked into this.

auth_sentence.content: Wading pleasantly through springtime Arkansas meadows brave with daisies.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wading pleasantly through springtime Arkansas meadows brave with daisies.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wading pleasantly through springtime Arkansas meadows brave with daisies.

auth_sentence.content: Dead mujahideen were said to smell pleasantly of musk.
auth_sentence.res_content: Dead mujahideen were said to smell pleasantly of musk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Dead mujahideen were said to smell pleasantly of musk.

sentences.cn: 很愉快地过了那段时间。

sentences.en: He was pleasantly surprised to discover that he was no longer afraid.
sentences.cn: 让他惊喜的是他发现自己不再害怕了。

sentences.en: The young singer was pleasantly surprised when waves of cheering broke over her at the end of her first performance.
sentences.cn: 那位年轻歌手首场演出结束时,台下响起了雷鸣般的喝彩声,使她又惊又喜。

sentences.en: We’ve spent our Easter holidays pleasantly.
sentences.cn: 我们的复活节假期过得很愉快。

sentences.en: I was very angry but was able to keep it in and spoke to him pleasantly.
sentences.cn: 我很生气,但还是控制住了自己,仍和颜悦色地跟他讲话。
